channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- iNotes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- iNotes

item.title: CVE-2017-1332|2024-09-16T17:33:16.656Z -- ibm -- inotes
item.description: IBM iNotes 8.5 and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126234.
